translations: n.（Provost）人名；（英）普罗沃斯特；（法）普罗沃

phrs.translation: 教务长, 副校长, 院长, 首席副校长
波渥斯, 沃斯特, 马丁·波渥斯
梵珀巴黎法式发艺, 梵珀巴黎, 梵珀巴黎美发沙龙

sentences.sentence: In 2003, Cambridge University appointed Alison Richard, another former Yale provost, as its vice-chancellor.
sentences.translation: 2003年，剑桥大学任命另一位前耶鲁教务长艾莉森·理查德为副校长。

sentences.sentence: He became provost in 2006 and President the following year.
sentences.translation: 他从2006年起担任教务长并于次年成为校长。
